meanings.sent1: He ejaculates his opinions without thinking.
meanings.sent2: She ejaculates a quick 'yes' when asked if she wants to go.
meanings.sent3: The teacher ejaculates the answer to surprise the students.
meanings.sent4: The news anchor ejaculates breaking news to the viewers.
meanings.sent5: The bird ejaculates a chirp before flying away.

meanings.definition: To eject semen from the body
meanings.sent1: The male frog ejaculates sperm to fertilize the eggs.
meanings.sent2: During reproduction, the male ejaculates to release sperm.
meanings.sent3: The doctor explains how the body ejaculates during climax.
meanings.sent4: In nature, some animals ejaculate to ensure reproduction.
meanings.sent5: The man ejaculates during intimacy with his partner.
